game.name: Steel Century Groove
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Steel Century Groove is a rhythm-RPG where you pilot mecha in dance battles! Challenge yourself against the deep music combat system, build a team of colossal dancers, make friends, and take on rivals as you groove from your cozy hometown to the big-city championship.
